taxonomicnotes: McClelland (1839) described Cobitis pavonacea from Assam. Grant (2007) placed the species under Nemacheilus.
rationale: Nemacheilus pavonaceus is recorded from only one location where the habitat is under threat from sedimentation due to deforestation.  Further research is needed to know population trends and surveys to determine its presence in other areas.  It is assessed as Vulnerable as its range is less than 20,000km2 and there is a continuing decline in the quality of habitat.
evaluator: Barbhuiya, A.H., Rema Devi, K.R., Dahanukar, N., Chaudhry, S. & Juffe Bignoli, D.
